mapper.insert: insert into quan_account_sub (id, account_id, balance, currency, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, account_id, balance, currency, type from quan_account_sub
